title: AlienLanguage
description: Denotes am impressionist view of the language of the ancient human race written in React using mongoose

title: FromAncientTimes
description: Rudimentary HTML and javascript code, expressively painted with hues of green and blue, signalling the birth of code from the first coder Ada Lovelace

title: InTheBeginning
description: Impressionist view of cave art, written in typescript

title: PatchworkCode
description: Impressionist art depicting the emotional journey in code, when applications are updated and parts of the code die and require a rebirth

title: TheAztecs
description: Ancient Aztec scribes, sensitively depicted in typescript. Hues of green are explored, to depict the art of the ancient natural world

title: TheGenius
description: An oil painting in the language Python. 'The Genius' shows a natural coder, able to stray beyond the standard lines of reality and into endless possibilities

title: TheHole
description: Reflects the emotion of the collaborative connections code. Where all other parts of the code are present, but the application cannot load because there is a fundamental missing part

title: TheMatrix
description: The Matrix' displays the monotonous and standardised reasoning of code. Whilst the colours show the love of code being brought to life and to create art

title: TheRegenerator
description: The regenerator shows one colourful and brilliant coding language dying to make way for the birth of another.
